details.msg: [LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Unnecessary complexity with conditional edges and should_continue logic when expert uses simple linear pipeline', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Complex state management with multiple state fields when expert uses simpler message-based state', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Redundant error handling in should_continue method that overcomplicates the flow', severity='minor'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue="Uses class-based architecture instead of expert's functional approach with separate utility functions", severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Creates graph instance in query method instead of having pre-compiled graph like expert', severity='minor')]
